interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2019/08/20
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español (Latinoamérica)'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (Latinoamérica) [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Rob Marshall'], 'Producers': ['Rob Marshall', 'John DeLuca', 'Marc Platt'], 'Starring': ['Emily Blunt', 'Ben Whishaw', 'Pixie Davies'], 'Studio': ['Walt Disney Pictures']}
Review Text: I had didn't have high expectations of this movie. I am tired of Disney redoing the classic movies and computer/lifelike film versions of our favorite animations. I love Emily Blunt...but not in this role. I felt that the whole movie lacked a strong execution of a storyline. That Mary Poppins came in and barely introduced herself before all her "magic" began. There was no real reason behind some of their adventures. Most were unnecessary. There was nearly no connection between Mary and Burt. Esp given their history...or even that Michael and Jane wouldn't be more excited that she was there??? It all was awkward. Sorry Disney, I will stick with Julie Andrews and Dick VanDyke. So quite redoing the movies!!!
Review Title: I was bored.
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
